item.title: Paradigms of AI Programming in Hy
item.description: I'm totally "hy-ped" about the Hy programming language. Last post I mentioned I was reading Paradigms of Artificial Intelligence Programming in my free time. I now decided to follow it along using Hy, and I'll keep my answers to the exercises on a GitHub repository. Hy makes a lot of …
item.dc:creator: Rony Reis
